text: Idaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasacca nti me bhikkhave pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi ñāṇaṃ udapādi paññā udapādi vijjā udapādi āloko udapādi
edit: Idaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasacca nti me bhikkhave pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi ñāṇaṃ udapādi paññā udapādi vijjā udapādi āloko udapādi

translations.transtext: Monks, vision, insight, wisdom, knowledge, [and] light arose to me in the teaching never heard before thus, "This [is] the path leading to the cessation of suffering as a noble truth."
